title: Children of Scotland
creator_credit: John Barnes and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: A survey of life in a Scottish fishing village on the Firth of Forth, showing through the eyes of children, the work of the fishermen. Pictures the children in their homes, and on a visit to a large fish market and to a shipbuilding town on the coast. Includes scenes of the ruins of a castle, recalling Scotland’s romantic past.
